<<<<<<< HEAD
The strange fortune of Alerane: or, My ladies toy. By H.M. of the middle Temple in London H. M., of the Middle Temple in London.
[34] p.
By V[alentine] S[immes] for M[atthew] L[ownes], Printed at London : 1605.
In verse. First word of title is xylographic. Printer's and publisher's names from STC. Signatures: A-D⁴ E² (-A1). Running title reads: My ladies toy. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
